name: boku-bot
description: To deploy `boku-bot`, run the following commands.

scripts.deploy: npm test && npm run build:ts && npm run sam:build && npm run sam:deploy
scripts.sam:build: sam package --template-file template.yaml --s3-bucket $(grep BOKU_BOT_S3_BUCKET .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --output-template-file out.yaml
scripts.sam:deploy: sam deploy --template-file ./out.yaml --stack-name BokuBotStack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region $(grep AWS_REGION .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently -n "action,mention" -c "green,magenta" "cd action-lambda && NODE_ENV=test npm run test" "cd mention-lambda && NODE_ENV=test npm run test"
